introduction: this short animation tells us the tale of tini witch trying to milk a huge cow.the film is Baumane's directoral debut and one of only three films she made in Latvia, before relocating herself to New York. it it taken from US released DVD "Ten Animated Films by Signe Baumane" which includes the following:1) the witch and the cow2) slippers (tiny shoes)3) the gold of the tigers4) love story5) the threatened one6) natasha7) five fucking fables8) woman9) dentist10) five infomercials for dentists
